name: Branded SMS Pakistan
author: H3 Technologies (Pvt.) Limited

sections.description:
Extend your WooCommerce store capabilities and create new opportunities for your business with Branded SMS Pakistan Plugin – the next level SMS plugin for WooCommerce.

Improve Customer Relationship
* Make your customers happy and notify them about order status change via SMS notifications. Every SMS Notification can be customized very easily from admin panel even in your Native Language.

Shipment Notification
* Send courier consignment / tracking number with complete details to customer for tracking. Ready to use with Trax Logistics, Swyft Logisitcs, Leopards Courier and others.

Personalized Messaging
* Branded SMS Pakistan is capable to personalized all kind of messages with WooCommerce available variables including Customer Name, Address, Email, Order Amount which can easily added in the message body.

WooCommerce Order Verification – OTP
* No need to call and verify customer’s order with Branded SMS Pakistan you can automate the order and customer verification by using our OTP feature which automatically generate a PIN code and send it to customer’s mobile number to enter on the order verification screen. You can also enable the one-click order verification link feature so your customer can verify order on a click!

Bulk SMS Marketing

Bulk Marketing feature is a premium feature of Branded SMS Pakistan’ plugin which provide the user to send the SMS in bulk amount to customer who recently purchased item from store, easily filtered by product name or by product categories without any difficulty. This premium feature contains of three main steps:

Select Products/Categories to Market
In this step user have to select the customers numbers by the product category (customers who’ve bought any product from that category) or by product name(customers who’ve bought that product). User can also select both options.

Message Body
In this step, user have to write the message which he wants to send to the customer’s numbers.

Summary of Campaign
In this step, Bulk Marketing feature will generate a summary of selected numbers which includes REPEATED NUMBERS which will be excluded, UNIQUE NUMBERS will be included in list of bulk SMS, and in the last it will show the message body which you’ve written to send to customers.

One Click Setup
* You can easily setup the messaging service by entering your Email Address and API Key. You can generate a API Key in our Developer Documentation section.
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

  1. Login to your WordPress Admin Panel. Search for Branded SMS Pakistan through Plugins > Add New interface.
  2. Find the plugin box of Branded SMS Pakistan and click on the Install Now button.
  3. Then activate the Branded SMS Pakistan plugin.
  4. You will see Branded SMS PK on Left Menu, Click on it. Plugin default page is configuration of SMS. Enter your Email Address and API Key which you can easily generate by logging into SMS Portal. See FAQ’s for more information
  5. All Done! Still have any question? Write us at hello@brandedsmspakistan.com or WhatsApp at 923151231015 – Happy to Answer!

Manual installation

  1. Download Branded SMS Pakistan
  2. Upload the Branded SMS Pakistan through Plugins > Add New > Upload interface or upload branded-sms-pakistan folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the Branded SMS Pakistan plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  4. You will see Branded SMS PK on Left Menu, Click on it. Plugin default page is configuration of SMS. Enter your Email Address and API Key which you can easily generate by logging into SMS Portal. See FAQ’s for more information
  5. All Done! Still have any question? Write us at hello@brandedsmspakistan.com or WhatsApp at 923151231015 – Happy to Answer!
sections.faq:
How to register with Branded SMS Pakistan?

You can register for free @ https://brandedsmspakistan.com/sms/account/signup

Is there’s any modification required to integrate SMS?

NO, everything is easily integratable on a click. All you need to install and activate. Get the API Key from SMS Portal and All Done

Where is my API Key?

You can get or re-genrate your API Key by accessing https://brandedsmspakistan/sms/developers/key/

Is it possible to register multiple brand name or masking

YES, you can register unlimited masking with one account

I don’t have NTN or Company Letterhead for Brand Name Registration

You can still use our service by requesting a generic mask name (for example: INFOSHARE) to send messages.

How much you charge for per SMS?

We charge very nominal price for WordPress WooCommerce users and we always prepare a custom plan depending on your monthly order traffic, please request for free quotation via Email or WhatsApp

Is this plugin is free?

YES! The basic version is free. However, to use bulk marketing feature you need to purchase a premium license

PHP 7 Support?

A. YES! Branded SMS Pakistan is compatible with PHP version 7.4
sections.changelog:
3.0.6

  • Compatibility added with HPOS

3.0.5

  • Compatibility added for Booster for WooCommerce Custom Order Sequence

3.0.4

  • Compatibility added for PostEx

3.0.3

  • Compatibility added for Trax Logistics, Swyft Logisitcs and Leopards Courier

2.0.8

  • Bug Fixed

2.0.7

  • Auto redirection on OTP verify

2.0.6

  • OTP Link Fixes
  • Added Product List Variable
  • Added Customer Notes and Currency Variable

2.0.5

  • OTP Issue Fixes

2.0.4

  • IBFT SMS On Hold feature added
  • Verification pending slug changed to verification due

2.0.3

  • OTP UI Fixed

2.0.2

  • Compatible with WooCommerce 4.0.1
  • Fixed OTP Issue
  • Added compatibility to Shipment Tracking Plugin

2.0.1

  • Added compatibility for WP version 5.4

2.0

  • Added Bulk Messaging Feature
  • Send Message to Customer who previously ordered, can be filtered by product or categories.

1.0.1

  • Few code fixes

1.0

  • Customer/Order Verification OTP
  • Order Status Update
  • Bit.ly API Integration

short_description: Branded SMS Pakistan - WooCommerce plugin will allow you to send Branded or Short Code SMS notification automatically for orders placed in WooCommerce …

screenshots.caption: Easily Configure API Keys available in your SMS Portal, selection of multiple masking from drop-down
Set custom text message in your native language on required WooCommerce event. Personalize your message with available variables like Customer Name, Order Amount and etc..
Order verification with confirmation code to verify mobile phone number of customer.
